attributes.action: Impeach David Cameron for Arms sales to Saudi Arabia used on Yemeni civilians
attributes.background: MOD knowingly licences Arms sales to Saudi Arabia for the use on civilians in Yemen. This practice is against International law.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept a petition calling for the impeachment of the Prime Minister because this procedure is now considered obsolete. It is not therefore clear what action could be taken on this petition. 
 
This note explains the history of impeachment and the current position: 

https://researchbriefings.intranet.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/SN02666#fullreport
 
If you are concerned about Government policy, you could start a petition about specific policies that concern you.
